title: Looking for a duo partner (mostly a sup main) for season 7 (i am a gold adc main)
body: Umm hello there, as my title says, i am a gold 5 adc main looking for a support main to duo with in season 7, i dont mind playing any adc, but i mainly main vayne, kalista, Ezreal, Draven, Lucian and Jinx as my mostly played. i don't mind which support you play as, as long as you know how to play the champion. My IGN is Vayne Senpai, so add me whenever and lets play a few matches together and see how we go, and if we have really good synergy, then we will both prep for next season and try to climb to a higher elo, my goal for next season is to achieve high plat or diamond, so yeah, add me whenever and lets play some! :D

replies.body:
Hi! I'm currently Silver V
I just added you. Maybe we can play when we get the time or something.
I am a support main, looking for a patient and nice adc . 

I can only play 3 supp champs atm:
{{champion:37}}  {{champion:267}}  {{champion:40}} 


Need to practice:
{{champion:89}}  {{champion:99}} {{champion:16}} 

Sometimes i can make plays but i prefer my adc to tell me what to do such as when to ult, if he's ready etc. not to go too aggro, you know? the basics?
Just sometimes i get flamed and ends up dying because my adc doesnt follow up or he goes in without me xD

I cant really play tanky supports but im trying to learn them :)

IGN Seekingsharks
Rank S5
I play mostly top-lane but I can also support I would really appreciate if you would give me a chance to play with you as I would also like to improve as a player
I will support you. I am bronze 4 with plat skill.
